mapper.select: select username as username, password as password, update_date as update_date, time_stamp as time_stamp from interviewworks.userdata where username = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into interviewworks.userdata (username, password, update_date, time_stamp) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{update_date}, #{time_stamp})
mapper.select: select secret_number as secret_number from interviewworks.secret where update_date like concat(#{dateFormatStr}, '%')
select secret_number as secret_number from interviewworks.secret where update_date = #{dateFormatStr}
select username as username from interviewworks.userdata where token_temp = #{token}
select token_temp as token from interviewworks.userdata where username = #{username}
